08-22-2024: - Dying with {{ItemIcon|Item=Siphon Bullets|Size=20}} Siphon Bullets stacks will now cause you to lose 2 stacks no matter who killed you (rather than returning 1 only if the victim killed you back)
- Fixed {{ItemIcon|Item=Siphon Bullets|Size=20}} Siphon Bullets acting as spirit damage for procs
08-15-2024: - You permanently steal 1 stack (45 HP) from the enemy if they die under the debuff. If an enemy you stole a stack from kills you, they regain 1 stack back.
08-01-2024: - Weapon damage is no longer conditional on 15m, now always gives +40% Weapon Damage (previously gave +45% when close)
06-27-2024: - Max HP Steal duration increased from 12s to 15s
06-20-2024: - Max HP Steal increased from 40 to 45
